section.name: Apache Taglibs
section.p: This project is an open source repository for JSP(tm) Tag Libraries.
In particular, Apache Taglibs hosts the Apache Standard Taglib, an implementation of the JSP Standard Tag Library (JSTL) specification. Versions 1.0, 1.1 and 1.2 of JSTL are all implemented.

section.name: Formerly Jakarta Taglibs
section.p: Apache Taglibs was originally called Jakarta Taglibs. When the project changed name, and moved over to coexist with the Tomcat project, many of the original taglibs were retired. See the Jakarta Taglibs retirement page for more on these taglibs.

td.font: The Apache Standard Taglib 1.2.1, an implementation of JSTL 1.2, has been released.
The Standard and RDC Taglibs have moved over to Tomcat. All other taglibs back at Jakarta have been deprecated and a new Extended Taglib created.
